fruit.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: something that grows on a plant, tree, or bush, can be eaten as a food, contains seeds or a stone, and is usually sweet
fruit.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: Try to eat plenty of fresh fruit.
a large garden with fruit trees
fruit.translation[0].definitions[0].note: Fruit is used as a countable noun when talking about particular types of fruit
fruit.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: the part of a plant, bush, or tree that contains the seeds
fruit.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: if a tree or a plant fruits, it produces fruit
